mapper.select: select id,name from gk_majored_category where 1=1 and parentId=#{parentId}
select id as majoredId, name,educationLevel,subjectType,majoredType,degree,similarMajored,mainCourse,workGuide from gk_majored where 1=1 and id=#{id}
select id,name from gk_enroll_plan where 1=1 and batch=#{batchName} and majoredId=#{id}
select id,major_name as name from zgk_major where major_name like CONCAT('%',#{keywords},'%') LIMIT 5

select count(*) from zgk_university uu left join zgk_university_major mm on uu.id=mm.universityId left join zgk_province pp on pp.id=uu.provinceCode left join zgk_data_dict dd on dd.type='PROPERTY' and dd.dictId=uu.type where mm.majorId=#{condition.majorId} and mm.educationLevel=#{condition.educationLevel}
